item0.name: Liandry's Anguish
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste
  • Agony: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage based on the target's bonus health (maxed at 1250 bonus health).
  • Torment: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

item4.name: Broken Stopwatch
item4.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item6.name: Scarecrow Effigy
item6.description:
Cannot be sold

Active - Trinket: Places an effigy that lasts for 130 - 300 (based on level) seconds and appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores one charge every 115 - 30 (based on level) seconds, up to maximum 2 charges.

Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.

perk0.name: Predator
perk0.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.
